name.baseName: cement production;cement, ordinary portland cement, 42.5MPa;new dry process;mixed solid wastes
水泥生产;水泥, 普通硅酸盐水泥, 42.5MPa;新型干法;混合固废

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Laboratory data. Carbide slag replaces limestone for cement production. The proportion of carbide slag in the raw material is 30%. The cement is produced by burning carbide slag generated by the acetylene industry in Heilongjiang. A pre-drying, dry grinding, and dry burning process developed by the Hefei Cement Research & Design Institute is used, which is currently an advanced dry process for producing cement using carbide slag. This process can increase the proportion of carbide slag in the raw material to over 60%, and the substitution rate of limestone can reach over 80%, and the stable formula increases the stability of carbide slag in the mill.
实验室数据。电石渣替代石灰石生产水泥。生料中电石渣配比30%。应用黑龙江乙炔化工行业所产生的电石渣烧制水泥。采用合肥水泥研究设计院开发了预烘干干磨干烧工艺，该工艺是目前较为先进的利用电石渣生产水泥的新型干法工艺。该工艺可使电石渣在生料配比提高到60%以上，石灰石替代率达80%以上，并且较为稳定的配料提高了电石渣入磨的稳定性。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: The use of carbide slag to produce cement clinker in my country began in the 1970s, when traditional wet kilns were mainly used for production [5]. Subsequently, semi-wet process, wet grinding and dry burning process and direct grinding, dry grinding and dry burning process gradually appeared [57]. Due to the shortcomings of the above process such as low calcium carbide slag content (or limestone replacement rate), large production load, and high energy consumption, even if non-renewable limestone resources are saved to a certain extent, the overall environmental load caused by cement production is still at a high level. , which is detrimental to the sustainable development of the cement industry. With the technological advancement of cement production technology and the in-depth research on calcium carbide slag, the technology of using calcium carbide slag to produce cement clinker is also constantly improving. In 2005, Hefei Cement Research and Design Institute developed a pre-drying, dry grinding and dry-burning process, which is currently a relatively advanced new dry process for producing cement using calcium carbide slag [58]. This process can make calcium carbide slag be used in raw material preparation. The ratio increased to more than 60%, the limestone replacement rate reached more than 80%, and the relatively stable ingredients improved the stability of carbide slag into the grinding mill.This section selects the above process and uses calcium carbide slag produced by the Heilongjiang Yikuai chemical industry to burn cement to improve the environmental coordination of the Heilongjiang cement industry and promote the sustainable development of the cement industry. The process flow of pre-drying, dry grinding and dry burning is shown in Figure 5-1.

我国利用电石渣生产水泥熟料始于 20 世纪 70 年代，当时主要采用传统湿法窑生产[5]。随后，逐渐出现半湿法工艺、湿磨干烧工艺及直接入磨干磨干烧工艺[57]。由于上述工艺存在电石渣掺量(或石灰石替代率)低、生产负荷大、能耗高等缺点，即使在一定程度上节约了不可再生石灰石资源，水泥生产造成的总体环境负荷仍然处于较高的水平，而这对水泥工业的可持续发展是不利的。随着水泥生产工艺的技术进步和对电石渣研究的深入，利用电石渣生产水泥熟料的工艺也在不断进步。2005 年，合肥水泥研究设计院开发了预烘干干磨干烧工艺，该工艺是目前较为先进的利用电石渣生产水泥的新型干法工艺[58].该工艺可使电石渣在生料配比提高到 60%以上，石灰石替代率达 80%以上，并且较为稳定的配料提高了电石渣入磨的稳定性。本节选取上述工艺，应用黑龙江乙快化工行业所产生的电石渣烧制水泥，以改善黑龙江水泥工业环境协调性，促进水泥工业可持续发展。预烘干干磨干烧工艺流程如图 5-1 所示。
technology.technologicalApplicability: This dataset describes the process for producing ordinary Portland cement with a 28-day compressive strength of 42.5MPa using the new dry process that incorporates mixed solid wastes, specifically carbide slag from the acetylene chemical industry in Heilongjiang as a substitute for limestone. This novel production technique developed by Hefei Cement Research & Design Institute allows the carbide slag proportion in raw materials to exceed 60%, replacing over 80% of limestone, thereby promoting environmental sustainability in the cement industry. This cement is applicable in construction projects requiring high-strength building materials.
该数据集描述了使用新型干法工艺生产28天抗压强度为42.5MPa的普通硅酸盐水泥的过程。该过程中混合固废，特别是黑龙江乙炔化工行业产生的电石渣，作为石灰石替代品。合肥水泥研究设计院开发的这种新工艺可以使原料中的电石渣比例超过60%，替代超过80%的石灰石，从而在水泥工业中促进环境可持续性。该水泥适用于需要高强度建材的建筑项目。

mathematicalRelations.modelDescription: The functional unit is the performance of 1kg cement with a 28-day compressive strength of 42.5MPa, that is, 1Fu=42.5kgMPa. The scope of evaluation is raw meal preparation, clinker calcination and cement preparation. The environmental load caused by the consumption of clay resources is not considered for the time being. Iron powder is an iron correction material, and its environmental impact will not be considered. The wastes considered to be emitted at the output end of the product system mainly include nitrogen oxides, sulfur dioxide, carbon dioxide and dust.
以1kg28天抗压强度为42.5MPa的水泥所具有的使用性能作为功能单位，即1Fu=42.5kgMPa。评价范围为生料准备、熟料煅烧和水泥制备。粘土类资源消耗造成的环境负荷暂不考虑。铁粉属于铁质校正材料，其引发的环境影响不予考虑。产品系统输出端考虑排放的废弃物主要包括氮氧化物、二氧化硫、二氧化碳及粉尘。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 于淼. (2008). 黑龙江水泥工业可持续发展研究 [硕士, 哈尔滨工业大学].
于淼. (2008). 黑龙江水泥工业可持续发展研究 [硕士, 哈尔滨工业大学].

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users of this dataset should apply it specifically to scenarios where ordinary Portland cement produced using the carbide slag substitution method is relevant. It is necessary to take into account the increased stability and substitute rate of limestone when comparing to traditional cement production processes. Considerations regarding the environmental impact should focus on the reduction of limestone extraction and possible alterations in the emission profile, including assessment of nitrogen oxides, sulfur dioxide, carbon dioxide, and dust emissions. This data is not suitable for processes that do not use carbide slag or for scenarios where the unique characteristics of the new dry process are not considered.
使用此数据集的用户应将其具体应用于使用电石渣替代方法生产的普通硅酸盐水泥相关的场景。在与传统水泥生产过程比较时，需要考虑石灰石稳定性的增强和替代率的提高。环境影响的考量应聚焦于石灰石采集减少和可能的排放特性变化，包括评估氮氧化物、二氧化硫、二氧化碳及粉尘排放。此数据不适用于不使用电石渣的工艺，或者在不考虑新型干法独特特性的场景中。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: Carbide slag. In the raw material, the carbide slag ratio is 30%.
电石渣。生料中电石渣配比30%。
Standard coal. The original data is 0.117kg standard coal, here converted to hard coal, the conversion formula is 1kg hard coal = 0.929kg standard coal.
标准煤。原始数据为0.117kg标准煤，这里换算为硬煤，换算公式为1kg硬煤=0.929kg标准煤。
Dust, with an unspecified particle size, is treated as PM > 10 micrometers in diameter.
粉尘，未标明粒径，按PM>10处理。
